(Switzerland) | cable chan 2 = Channel 121 | sat radio serv 1 = | sat radio chan 1 = | iptv serv 1 = | iptv chan 1 = | online serv 1 = | online chan 1 = | 3gmobile serv 1 = }} '''Disney Junior''' is a children's specialty channel in France. The channel offers various programs for preschoolers and older children from [[Playhouse Disney]] and other sources. == Programming == * ''[[Jake and the Never Land Pirates]]'' * ''[[Babar and the Adventures of Badou]]'' (Coming Soon) * ''[[Mickey Mouse Clubhouse]]'' * ''[[The Magic Roundabout]] '' * ''[[Imagination Movers (TV series)|Imagination Movers]]'' * ''[[Jungle Junction]]'' * ''[[Handy Manny]]'' * ''[[Little Einsteins]]'' * ''[[Special Agent Oso]]'' * ''[[Charlie and Lola (TV series)|Charlie and Lola]]'' * ''[[Guess with Jess]]'' * ''[[Eloise: The Animated Series]]'' (Coming Soon) * ''[[Art Attack]]'' * ''[[Rolie Polie Olie]]'' * ''[[Make Way For Noddy]]'' (Coming Soon) * ''[[Lilo and Stitch: The Series|Lilo and Stitch]]'' * ''[[Cars Toons]]'' * ''[[Elliot Moose (TV series)|Elliot Moose]]'' (Coming Soon) == References == {{Disney Channel}} {{Television in France}} {{France-tv-station-stub}} [[Category:Disney Channel]] [[fr:Disney Junior France]]
